蔒字的基本解释

蔒
hūn
古同“荤”。

蔒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hūn］
［《廣韻》許云切，平文，曉。］
“焄2”的被通假字。“荤1”的繁体字。亦作“蔒1”。
(1)指辛味的菜。如：葱、蒜、韭、薤之类。
(2)指鸡、鸭、鱼、肉等食物。与“素”相对。
[②]［xūn］
［《廣韻》許云切，文平，曉。］
“荤2”的繁体字。亦作“蔒2”。
见“葷2粥”、“葷2允”。

蔒字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蔒； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1054第05
【集韻】同葷。蔒蒿，氣蒸出貌。互見葷蒿字註。

蔒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蔒字的起名意思

暂无。

蔒
Basic explanation of words
蔒
hūn
Ancient with "meat".
蔒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hūn］
["Guangyun" Xu Yunqie, Pingwen, Xiao. ]
"Yuan 2" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "荤1". Also known as "蔒1".
(1) Refers to spicy dishes. Such as: onions, garlic, leeks, scallions and the like.
(2) Refers to foods such as chicken, duck, fish, and meat. Contrast with "Vegetarian".
[②]［xūn］
["Guang Yun" Xu Yunqi, Wen Ping, Xiao. ]
"荤2" in traditional characters. Also known as "蔒2".
See "Men 2 Congee", "Men 2 Allowance".
蔒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Ji Zi Department] 　蔒; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1054 to 05
【Ji Yun】Same as meat. Artemisia arborescens, steaming to its appearance. See each other's notes on the word "Munhao".
蔒
